content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://pavangen2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxidata/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]



SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxidata@pavangen2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
       
    ) AS [result]
